tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE referral_patterns (
 referral_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 patient_id INT,
 referring_physician_id INT,
 referred_physician_id INT,
 referral_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE referrals (
    referral_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    referring_physician_id INT,
    referred_physician_id INT,
    referral_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE kickbacks (
    kickback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    kickback_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    referring_physician_id INT,
    referred_physician_id INT,
    kickback_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE referrals (
  referral_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  physician_id INT,
  referral_date DATE,
  referral_reason TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE physicians (
  physician_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  physician_name VARCHAR(50),
  specialty TEXT,
  hospital_affiliation VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  patient_dob DATE,
  patient_gender CHAR(1)
)

CREATE TABLE kickbacks (
  kickback_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  kickback_amount DECIMAL,
  kickback_date DATE,
  involved_physicians INT[],
  involved_referral_ids INT[]
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  patient_dob DATE,
  patient_gender CHAR(1),
  patient_phone VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE doctors (
  doctor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  doctor_name VARCHAR(50),
  doctor_specialty VARCHAR(50),
  doctor_hospital VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE referrals (
  referral_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  referral_date DATE,
  patient_id INT,
  doctor_id INT,
  referral_reason TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE payments (
  payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  payment_date DATE,
  referral_id INT,
  amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  payment_method VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE kickbacks (
  kickback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  kickback_date DATE,
  doctor_id INT,
  amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  kickback_description TEXT
)
